item.title: Nifty Struggles At 24,600 In Choppy Expiry Session; Metals, PSU Banks Outperform

item.title: Why Spotify Stock Is Slipping 2% In Premarket
item.description: Goldman analysts said the stock is increasingly pricing in Spotify's forward growth at current levels.

item.title: American Battery Stock Rises In Premarket Today: What’s Powering The Stock Rally?
item.description: The stock nearly doubled in value between September 18 and September 24, following a strong earnings report.
